name: BugSplosion
description:
Squish all the bugs before they run out of sight!

BugSplosion is an intense retro style action game with an original bitpop soundtrack. The soundtrack features tracks inspired by the C64, Atari ST, Amiga and NES.

Features:
+ 8 worlds
+ 48 levels
+ Original Bitpop Soundtrack
+ Classic & Endless Game Modes
+ Trophies
+ Competitive Leaderboard
+ Game Center Achievements
